cn.title: Name
cn.description: Arbitrary/Meaningful name of the Store Access Control ID Rule

dcmStoreAccessControlID.title: Store Access Control ID
dcmStoreAccessControlID.description: Access Control ID assigned to whole Studies or individual Series which attributes match all conditions.

dcmAccessControlSeriesIndividually.title: Access Control Series Individually
dcmAccessControlSeriesIndividually.description: Indicates if access of series should be controlled individually or not.

dcmRulePriority.title: Rule Priority
dcmRulePriority.description: If the condition of several Store Access Control ID rules match for a received image, higher priority rule is applied. If there are several matching rules with equal priority, it is undefined which rule gets applied.

dcmProperty.title: Conditions
dcmProperty.description: Conditions in format {key}[!]={value}. Refer applicability, format and some examples.
